category.title: Individual Ghostsigns
category.description: Details, including photos, of an individual sign location

category.title: Alcohol & Tobacco
category.description: Also includes matches.  Bars and pubs appear in the Hotels & Restaurants category.

category.title: Household & Furniture
category.description: Includes pianos, carpets, antiques, gardening, auction houses.

category.title: Media & Entertainment
category.description: Includes cinemas, music, television, radio, stationery.

category.title: Medical & Health
category.description: Includes chemists, opticians, shaving products, soap.

category.title: Services & Financial
category.description: Includes post offices, estate agents, utilities, bookshops, libraries, printers, undertakers, religious organisations.

category.title: Shoes & Clothing
category.description: Includes bags, purses, wallets, jewellery, watches, retailers.

category.title: Tradesmen & DIY
category.description: Includes paints, removals, craftsmen, engineers, warehouses, coal merchants.

category.title: Travel & Transport
category.description: Includes tyres, fuel, garages, car parks.

category.title: Ghostsigns Collections
category.description: Galleries, archives and other collections of multiple Ghostsigns.

category.title: Articles, Videos & Research
category.description: Background material not related to a specific Ghostsign.
